commit.message: Remove unused code. Move ShenandoahRendezvousClosure close to where it's used.
Disable weakroots together with evacuation at safepoint, and in a separate vmop in shortcut cycles
Correct order of rendezvous, global- and local-flag updates; cleanup rendezvous
Ensure test does a complete GC cycle before verification
8263427: Shenandoah: Trigger weak-LRB even when heap is stable
